pages.title: Tool Materials
pages.text: These materials grant effects that enhance mining, harvesting, and utility work.

pages.title: Diamond
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Mining Speed +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Bright Blue$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Any mining tool$(br2)Increases block breaking speed by 50%! Essential for efficient mining.

pages.title: Emerald
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Fortune +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Emerald Green$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Pickaxes$(br2)Increases ore and crop drops. The classic treasure material!

pages.title: Amethyst Shard
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Silk Touch +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Purple$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Specialty tools$(br2)Mine blocks in their original form. Delicate and precise!

pages.title: Blaze Powder
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Auto-Smelt +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Orange$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Mining pickaxes$(br2)Instantly smelts ores and blocks as you mine them!

pages.title: Coal
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Vein Miner (AOE Mining) +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Dark Gray$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Any tool$(br2)Breaks all connected blocks of the same type!

pages.title: Wheat Seeds
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Auto-Replant +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Yellow-Green$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Hoes$(br2)Automatically replants crops after harvesting!

pages.title: Oak Sapling
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Tree Capitator (Tree Felling) +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Forest Green$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Axes$(br2)Chops down entire trees in one swing!

pages.title: Iron Ingot
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Item Magnet +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Silver$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Any tool$(br2)Pulls dropped items toward you automatically!

pages.title: Redstone
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Haste +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Red$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Tools and weapons$(br2)Grants the Haste status effect while held!

pages.title: Echo Shard
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Quantum Harvest +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Dark Cyan$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() All tools$(br2)Mysterious quantum effects that manipulate probability during harvesting!

pages.title: Observer
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Domino Effect +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Gray$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Mining tools$(br2)Breaking one block triggers chain reactions on nearby similar blocks!

pages.title: Bell
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Sound Harvesting +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Golden$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() All tools$(br2)Harvest resources from sounds and vibrations in the world!
